website_summaries.verdict: A decorative tabletop option for a bit of extra ambiance during outdoor evening gatherings or parties. An inexpensive piece of decor that adds plenty of oomph to a patio space.
pros: Choose from steady soft white light or multi-color mode that switches through hues
Automatically turns on when sun sets
Once it’s charged and on thanks to the sensor, light lasts all night
cons: Light is not bright enough to be functional
Works best as a decorative centerpiece

website_summaries.verdict: Adds color to your outdoor areas, but it's not sturdy lighting.
pros: Stands out in gardens and landscaped areas
cons: delicate pieces must be handled with care

customer_reviews.title: Shines so bright!! Worth every penny! Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Mom’s Birthday & she absolutely loves it! The colors are bright & beautiful! The light can be set to stay clear or it can be set to rotate through a sequence of 5-6 different colors (my personal favorite). The solar charges throughout the day and keeps the light shining bright until the sun comes up when it automatically shuts off. Without a doubt, this was money well spent. I will be purchasing another one for a gift & maybe a third because I want one for myself 😊
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light. Lasts a long time. It comes on at dusk/when dark and turns off at daylight. Happened to look outside at 5:30 am and it was still on!!! Just had it a few days but highly recommend so far. Only dislike is that the top fits kind of loose on the glass globe. Probably not water proof, but its bottom is open so it won’t hold water.
customer_reviews.author: TexMexLCDR

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful tabletop solar light. I bought it for a friend for her birthday and she LOVED it. Then I bought myself one because I thought her pic of it lit up at night was gorgeous! Then I bought my sister one for her birthday and she loved it and then because she put pics on Facebook, other people wanted it also....so I shared the link! I bought 2 more...one for a prize for a Book Club and another I bought for a friend. You will not be disappointed. You can change the setting on it to get different colors too!
customer_reviews.author: MinnMom

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I am revising my previous review for two (2) reasons: 1. The seller immediately contacted me after my initial less-than-favorable review of their product - and desired to make things right. - and - 2. On occasion, we get 'lemons' - products that slip through assembly that are not representative of the manufacturer's quality guidelines. That said, the seller is sending me a new globe - as a customer/consumer, that says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Colors. Quality Product. Please Make a HUGE ONE NEXT!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was odd that both the top and bottom had an opening. But I guess it's good if you want to turn it upside down and put the solar fitting on the other end and it just sits on the table. The colors are gorgeous! I just love this! I wish they would make a huge one on a stand that I could put in my yard. It would be STUNNING with a big one!
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Not all are created equal
customer_reviews.text: My son gave me one of these for Christmas and I just couldn't wait to see it so I put it outside right away. It was so darn cute I ordered another one so I could put them on my brick pillars in the yard. The second one arrived with no "skin" over the solar panel which made me nervous as it usually means it was a return. It does light up, but not as bright and, so far, not for more than an hour. I hope this summer when the sun is stronger it will do better. Was hoping to get a bunch for the tables for parties.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased my third one of these beautiful solar lights
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my third one of these beautiful solar lights. Two were gifts and one was for me. They are just lovely! Everyone comments on them. I have mine on a bistro table in my garden. It glows from dusk to dawn. I just love this light and so do the friends I gifted. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: rosemary aronson

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller, Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice and so is the seller. I had an issue with the first one, but they sent me a new item and I am very happy with it. This item is not to light an entire room, so please do not leave negative feedback due to that issue because it's not what it is supposed to do. The colors are gorgeous when it has a full solar charge. I highly recommend this item and I recommend this seller even more. Good customer service goes a long way in my book, and this seller exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Cute, works great
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, still not clear if the solar cover goes on top or bottom! Lol both sides are open. Instructions didnt say. Works either way though.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: No bottom.....nothing to enclose the inside!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed to see a product like this that looks unfinished. There is absolutely nothing to set it on except for the bottom rim. Every item I have purchased similar to this had a rubber cap on the bottom to protect the inside and also prevent it from slipping on the surface you set it on. How can they expect the consumer to be happy with something they tried to make as cheaply as possible?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mom

customer_reviews.title: amended review. 5 stars now
customer_reviews.text: This is an addendum to my first review. Customer service reached out to me and sent a replacement orb and it works fine. These are lovely orbs and everyone comments about their beauty. Mine is used as a night light and lid recharged every day. I am wondering how to replace solar lid when it no longer works. Makes a great gift also. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charlot

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: this is the worse item i ever had the misfortune to buy. It is the flimsiest ever, lights up almost not at all. after 3 days we had a little summer winds it is so light it just tumbled across the grass. It had a very little bit of light that night and the next night NOTHING, I was so angry and disappointed i just threw it away. I could have just threw the20.00 it cost away
customer_reviews.author: Elvira Howell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dusk to Dark Lighting Option
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! I've had this on my patio table for the past three nights. It stays lit for at least 6 hours. Could be longer. The colors are really beautiful. Adds just the right amount of lighting for the dusk to dark hours. I'd say it has a moderate weight. I'd suggest bringing it indoors during excessively high wind times. The design is fairly intricate, but very nice looking. I always love solar options. No need to worry about replacing batteries. I have mine set on the morphing function. Hoping the LED and battery last for a long time. Love it! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Nickerson

customer_reviews.title: This is truly beautiful. I use it as a patio table centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: This is truly beautiful. I use it as a patio table centerpiece. My only criticism it that the top and bottom edges are only glass. Nothing to protect it from breaking. I think I'll use some silicone to give it some protection. Despite this shortcoming, I'd still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie B

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty colored solar light
customer_reviews.text: This is the right size for a tabletop and looks pretty even when not lit up. At night (after charging in the sun all day), the colors are really beautiful. It lasts well into the night, and my neighbors have commented on how pretty the light is. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Bought as birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: So cool! Bought this as a birthday gift for my mom and it lights up very bright each night, either as a solid light or changing colors (you choose the setting). It works inside too if it's close enough to a window to get some light. It stays lit up for a long time, coming on at dusk and still remaining illuminated in the morning. It's a nice decoration even when the light isn't on. Great decoration and gift, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful solar centerpiece!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful looking solar glass globe light that adds to our outdoor decor. The globe itself feels solid despite looking like it's cracked. The mosaic pattern is fantastic & the light color that changes makes for a very neat pattern display. The switch on the led light allows for off, white & color changing modes. The sun keeps the rechargeable batteries charged & the light turns on when it starts to becomes dark. There are a few different colors that cycle when the led light is working. The globe has great weight to it, so it stays in place on our table even during high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin A

customer_reviews.title: Pretty at night
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this is solar. It's really pretty at night. I just wish that the light is brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to your patio
customer_reviews.text: Really unique. We put them on the end tables on our patio. Have had them all summer and they work great. Colors change and at night it really looks cool ! Even on a cloudy day, they charge up enough to last ALL NIGHT LONG.
customer_reviews.author: Why Me.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Rudimentary
customer_reviews.text: The light is beautiful at night but the design is a little incomplete. So far it has held up in rainy weather, but the design seems incomplete because the bottom of the globe isnt enclosed. If you hold it upside down there is an opening in the bottom almost big enough to put a can of soda in. Makes me a little uncomfortable with the products durability. Ive had it for 2 months with no problems so far, so I cant give it a bad review by any means. It just seems a little incomplete is all. I really enjoy having it in my flower bed though. It brings a nice aesthetic to my yard and house in the evenings.
customer_reviews.author: Kozmo

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use this after purchasing a month ago. The weather hadn't been cooperating so I didn't put it out. This past weekend was nice so I let it soak up some sun. I couldn't wait until it was dark to see it. It did NOT disappoint! I absolutely love it and so have my friends. A couple even asked where I got it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RAE65

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Light, Not Worth The Money
customer_reviews.text: After much debate, I've decided to keep this item ONLY because I do think it's pretty. That said, it's WAY over priced for what it is. It's quite small (about the size of a large grapefruit), SUPER LIGHT, and fragile. When I first picked up the box it came in, I half thought it was empty. I'm almost afraid a strong wind might knock it off the table and break it, as I have it outdoors. For looks, 5 stars. For quality/durability/value, only 1 star. This thing should legitimately sell for no more than $10. It was about $21 when I purchased. I feel a bit cheated. :(
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I love this solar light so much. I charged it only for a couple of hours and it has been working indoors for more than a day. Very pretty. I only gave it three stars for if it is weatherproof because I won't leave mine outdoors other than to charge it in the sun. The glass globe is thin and open at both ends. The lights are in a handy little disc lid. It will come on automatically in the dark and turn off in the light. There are three settings for off/ white/ color change. It would make a good gift.
customer_reviews.author: Boffo

customer_reviews.title: WOW total rip off!
customer_reviews.text: More cheap products from China. This had NO bottom. Very light weight, cannot use outside. Has a white top that is tacky, not black like the one shown. No rubber bottom for stability. Not worth the money! Go and find a better product!
customer_reviews.author: Bewhatur

customer_reviews.title: it's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The design seems smart - it can't fill up with water because there is no bottom. When you flip the rubber-covered switch cover, look closely for the little black plastic switch beneath it for OFF, White, and Color, as marked. We use the color setting which morphs into many distinct and bright colors through the fractured/mosaic style glass outer surface. The directions say you can bring it indoors too. I imagine it could be charged through direct sunlight entering the window too. My wife is over the moon about it.
customer_reviews.author: Black Hole Gang

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to set on a small table next to our rocking bench. It was perfect! It's very pretty during the day and at night the lights are bright and beautiful. There is a hole on the bottom so rain water can get back out with no problems. We've gotten a lot of rain this season and it's still working just fine. Hoping all will be fine next summer when I get it back out of storage! The only thing I wasn't a fan of was not knowing which color glass ball I was getting. I would have preferred the darker color ball but received the lighter color - like I said though, it's still very very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: JPlattinum

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: Verdict - BUY CONS - I'll give you the down side first. So, I'd note the picture shown - this thing ain't pretty. Looks like broken glass. PRO - Wow. This thing is built to last. Had mind for over 2 years. Rain, snow, ocean salt spray... it just keeps shining. All year round. Every night. Unlike MOST of theseow cost solar lights, the battery on this will LAST ALL NIGHT. OverallOverall, ImI'm impressed. And I've bought a lot of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Jopling

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights, disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to buy globes that are the same as a set I’ve had for several years. Although these looked to be the same, they are of poor quality. They do light up brightly and I like the color changing feature. But the tops lift right off, so if you grab one to move it, there is a risk of dropping it. The bottoms are rough; watch your furniture. And my older models have a hanger at the top with which I can hange the lights from tree branches, umbrellas, gutters, a pergola, etc. It was a great feature that I miss in this set.
customer_reviews.author: ABCrocks

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best mood light I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Received in NC. Took unopened to our2nd home in Costa Rica. Set on the deck in the sun and the rain charging for a few hours. Inside as it grew dark came on automatically sensing low light. Had it set for changing color LED. Sparkling brilliant lites from the glass inset lenses. Illuminated 10 hours until daylight came into our bedroom. Been through weeks of use in some really tough tropical mountainous conditions. I have ordered more. Great follow up from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Warren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very pleasing product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and aesthetically pleasing light. Very light and pleasant to look at even when not lit. I chose the non starry one. It has to be in a completely dark place. It does not come on even if there is a faint light. Will upload a pic soon. I do have to say that its not as bright as it looks on the website. In reality the light effect is very subdued. I have to figure out the charging instructions. Overall a good buy- definitely good for gifting....Am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good but Expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are pricey, but seem to last a long time and look good. This turns on automatically at dusk and stays lit for 6+ hours. The colors fade between 3 different colors. The fade is a nice touch. I hope this last for a year or more since it is more expensive than most solar products.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: To dim, to lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, but only if your sitting practically on top of it, you cant see the stary effect at any distance, and the whole thing is barely visable from any distance, its way to dim! All the light shines down, out of the missing bottom! If you want to light up underneath your patio table then this could be the light for you lol. Also, its too lightweight, the first good storm we had it blew off the table to shatter all over the cement! Maybe the open bottom caught the wind, thru the openwork metal bistro table i have, who knows. But id certainly not buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: bluejewel24

customer_reviews.title: Bright light!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about buying this as I thought it was bigger.. When I got it, I love it! I don't even care that it's a bit small for what I originally wanted it for.. It's perfect for a table or keeping it indoors (as long as it can get sun during the day). I decided to keep it indoors on a small round table with a diffuser and it's so nice at night! ❤️ My table is right next to the window where it gets solar power.. Its very bright at night and usually stays on the whole night. The brightness of the light dims down by the morning. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Flores

customer_reviews.title: Add a little magic to your outdoor space!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous quirky little light that has transformed our outdoor space . I love the mesmerizing changing colors. It's covering up the umbrella hole in the center of our patio table. So far we have left it on all the time -- it goes on automatically at dusk and charges in the sun during the day. I have only had it for a week so I can't speak for its durability. If it lasts it will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rothstein

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on June 6th and now is Aug. 31. All color is gone from the globe. It works well lighting up at night and lasts pretty much till morning, but is just a cloudy white now. A bit disappointing as when it was new it was really pretty with all the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: K. WILSON

customer_reviews.title: Solar Powered Glass Ball Led Light
customer_reviews.text: I purchased eight of these on January third and in July 7th three of them stopped working and it has nothing to do with luck of sun, we get extreme sun 365 days of the year in Baja California North basically desert. Update: I will raise the stars to four since the seller is being accommodating and offering to replace the units that went bad. In my opinion that says a lot about their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Martinez

customer_reviews.title: This thing is legitimately beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It charges and stays lit all night. It's also extremely durable for a little glass ball. Besides weathering several storms (including hail) and birds, cats, and squirrels hopping all over it, I accidentally left it out last winter and it is working perfectly this year. You can select a solid color or color changing. It casts a fair amount of light. You can't ready by it, but it gives a little less than a tea light glow. It' also pretty when it's not lit as the sun shines through it. I adore it
customer_reviews.author: Jamey ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!  But pretty pricey for the size
customer_reviews.text: I do love the way it looks! Came totally uncharged, but a day in the hot sun did the trick. Very fragile- Mercury glass. I don't think that I would feel good about leaving it outside, so I it is now in a kitchen window that gets lots of sun. I'm scouting for Christmas presents, but this one doesn't look like it matches the price. In fact, I bought one bigger and hangable at TJX for 9.99. Doesn't change color, but still!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nashville Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty when lit but the bottom is open and the ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I expected. Very pretty when lit but the bottom is open and the top does not secure (the bulb and sun portion), only sets on the top of the ball so I hope it does not affect the integrity. Overall, very pretty at night when lit, I just expected a bit bigger and the top to secure tightly along with an actual bottom for almost 20 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Keller

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: This stunning and well-made light is the centerpiece of my outdoor dining area. It looks lovely in the daytime, when the sun hits the lovely mosaic--but at night it comes to life with amazing, vivid colors that just keep on going! I woke up at 5AM just to check--and it was still going strong! I intend to purchase a few more to place in different areas, so I can enjoy the spectacular colors from every room. They make a great housewarming gift!
customer_reviews.author: JoannaK

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I opened this that the bottom is completely open. I should have read closer. Yet, I thought it would still be really pretty. It's only fair. It's very dim and hard to see from inside my house looking out through my sliding glass doors. That was a big disappointment. It's very very lightweight and during some rain and wind, it blew off the stand. Definitely not weatherproof. I really prefer my solar lights that are on a pole as they don't blow and glow much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Annliz

customer_reviews.title: This item is very fragile. The first time we ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only am I pleased with the item, I had a problem that was clearly not their fault and their customer service was EXCELLENT in working with me. I am very pleased and can't say enough about a company that stands behind its products. I wish all companies cared this much about pleasing it customers. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: toots

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, better to be indoors!
customer_reviews.text: So we had to glue this to a base to keep it from blowing away! It is so light weight & hollow inside. The stars are gone too which disappeared pretty quickly once I put it outside. The brightness has stayed consistant though. It did get water inside of it which I dumped out & it has continued to work. Seems like it is meant for indoors, not really solar that can handle the weather. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but where’s the base cover?
customer_reviews.text: The light is beautiful but it seems like such a shame there is no base cover. Even something plastic to cap off the hole in the bottom. I’m not putting this on a stick or pole, it just looks unfinished and cheapens it. I mean how big of a deal would the cost be for a plastic bottom cover to snap on like the top. Otherwise it’s lovely for the price does the job. I would not gift because of the base issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking colorful solar decorative light
customer_reviews.text: Nice but a little smaller than I expected but that’s my fault. I prefer it with the white light setting as it shows plenty of color. I bring it in at night in case it rains. I find it stays lit all night long and has a nice cast. It would be especially nice to give to a child for their room. Sometimes I put it on my coffee table or the front hall table when guests are coming over. If you put it where it can get sun indoors it will come on when it’s dark. It might not last all night but certainly long enough. I would buy it again as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Beaches

customer_reviews.title: Ball-awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap-in-a-pita this thing is efficient! I got it UBER fast on Sun., set it up that night, and it was glowin' like the feakin' sun by Mon. night despite how yucky and rainy out ALL DAY it was. It's super-pretty and resilient: HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ericaw

customer_reviews.title: These are a must buy!  Beautiful and last for years!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought 1 about 4 years ago, and it is a beautiful as ever! We bought another about a year ago and, like the 1st, it is amazing! Great for outside table top, or dark area in your yard or garden. We just purchase another for our daughter for her balcony. You will not be disappointed , and longevity makes it a plus + plus purchase!!! I want more. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Addict

customer_reviews.title: Even the Men Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a dinner party and even the men loved it. Several friends said they were going to get one for their yard. It charged in a couple of hours and glowed all night. It was more elegant than it is in the picture. My only complaint is that they don't make a larger version. ONE YEAR LATER: It is still working. It has been in the open in the back yard for almost a year and is going strong! Can't believe it!! The best money I have spent for yard decor.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S.

customer_reviews.title: SO PRETTY
customer_reviews.text: This item is so pretty!! I let the sun charge it during the day and at night it brings beautiful colorful changing lights between the plants on my balcony. The mosaic glass itself is very pretty as well. If you are using it outside where it can get wet...turn it upside down so it doesn’t collect water. I certainly Enjoy the peace and ambience that comes from These lights!
customer_reviews.author: Kerron morain Donna juliemango

customer_reviews.title: No bottom, white tacky top, light weight and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst outdoor solar light I've ever seen. The white top with the solar panel is really tacky looking. There is no bottom. It is super light weight. This thing wouldn't last 1 day in the Colorado outdoors. I'm returning it. So sad because the pictures make it look good. But it's not. I'm not sure how this got so many amazing reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Anyone

customer_reviews.title: Barrage of colors
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of solar decorative piece. The multicolors are so pretty. It came well packed and was easy to assemble. I have kept it on wood gravel in backyard. It has withstand sprinklers and harsh sun. This piece glows and changes color. It lasts for around 6-7hrs. Pretty piece.
customer_reviews.author: Raga

customer_reviews.title: Great Speckled Glass and Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: The light has settings for color which switches between 5 colors, white stays one color and off. The speckled glass looks really nice quality. The reason I gave it 3 stars is because after a year and a half, the light is broken in that it does not cut off and is constantly using up batteries. BTW, all these take 2 AA solar batteries that must be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tadros

customer_reviews.title: Great Mother’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother for Mother’s Day and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: MMN

customer_reviews.title: Glass Globe Ball Light for for Garden, Patio, Party, Yard, Outdoor/Indoor Decorations, is fair.
customer_reviews.text: Pandawill Color Changing Mosaic Solar Light, Multi-colored1 Waterproof/Weatherproof Crystal Glass Globe Ball Light for for Garden, Patio, Party, Yard, Outdoor/Indoor Decorations. I use it in my Flowerbed enhancement. It functions fine but I was disappointed with its brilliance isn’t like the picture. Thanks for asking, Linda Jo Hendren.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jo  Hendren

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is pretty surprising. It’s very small, about the size of either a huge grapefruit or a very small cantaloupe. The light it casts is really pretty, and the solar panel is fantastic. It sits on my porch nowhere near direct sunlight and it still lights up all night. It’s a pretty table decoration or a small garden ornament, and honestly you could use it as a night light if you left it in a sunny window.
customer_reviews.author: Selkie

customer_reviews.title: Very little color
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty up close, but from even a slight distance, the colors are very washed out and pale. Nothing like the picture. It does seem sturdy and well-made, but the glass in the globe should have either been darker or the color-changing light should be a deeper, richer color. I bought it for a gift but decided not to give it after seeing it lit. Will probably return.
customer_reviews.author: Lebe

customer_reviews.title: Stunning light
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our back patio and it is absolutely perfect!!! We set it in the center of the table and it looks stunning. I was worried that with it being a covered patio, the solar panel would not get enough light to recharge it, but it's beautiful and bright at night, even shaded a bit during the day. It seems to be good quality, and the colors are gorgeous. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a small glass ball with an open end of the bottom - not at all what I expected after reading the description. The solar top is not secure to the ball at all, which makes me wonder if wind will blow it off. You can't glue it down, so I guess I am a bit disappointed. I haven't placed it outside, but not sure that I will now.
customer_reviews.author: Kat and Marty

customer_reviews.title: This is AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I am the type of person who loves sparkles and twinkle lights. I was looking for an outdoor light, but when I saw this, I thought it would be perfect indoors. I had a relaxing projector light that made sounds, but I actually like this much better! It is sooo beautiful and no electricity needed! Very soothing to look at!
customer_reviews.author: Kare Solutions

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but not as I wanted or imagined it
customer_reviews.text: This item is bigger and more attractive on the web than the one I received. It's nice but not as I wanted or imagined it. Also, some of the small glass pieces are missing or broken. I wanted to return it but I found out that shipping fees will be deducted from my its price. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this light is terrible! It’s smaller than it looks in online and very light weight. It lasted on our patio table about a week until a normal breeze one night knocked it off and it shattered all over. The light was pretty, but not very bright. It is maybe worth $5, definitely not $22 that I wasted on it.
customer_reviews.author: Katey B

customer_reviews.title: ... had this two years and it looks just as beautiful today. We live close to the beach and ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this two years and it looks just as beautiful today. We live close to the beach and this is not affected by the moist air year round. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: I’m very impressed by the quality and beauty of this little solar light.
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how well this works and charges! It’s lasted an entire season so far, still working great!! I’ve used both the color changing and solid white light, this little solar light just keeps shining night after night, even when it’s been a gray day outside. I’m impressed by its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fair light likeness - makes my backyard twinkle!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, one as a gift for a friend who had open heart surgery - and one for myself. I love lights in my backyard, even have the old style Christmas tree lights in the grapevines. Anyway, my friend sent me a thank you card - and said, she couldn't wait to see how the "fairylights" looked! I can tell you, it puts out some fun shadows and pretty colors. A sweet cut glass colorful fairylight addition to your garden! Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Murray

customer_reviews.title: Charming Solar Patio light
customer_reviews.text: Two options for lighting - white bulb or color. the mosaic glass gives off a pretty pattern at night. The solar pack is good quality and seems weather proof. The light lasts a long time and is bright. I'm really enjoying it. Customer service was very responsive when I contacted them with a question.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can leave it White but it is much prettier changing colors.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these color changing solar lights last year and and loved it. Unfortunately, I put it away after the summer and haven't been able to find it. So rather than going crazy looking for it anymore I decided to order another one. I love it just as much and hope to put it away safely in my closet after the summer so I can continue to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina  Bonitatis

customer_reviews.title: Great as a centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: We used this as a centerpiece at an in-home wine tasting party and everyone loved it. I’d set it out in full sun for two days (just to be sure) prior to the party and it lasted all evening. I’m excited to use it for future parties- both inside and outside. It’s safer and prettier than candles.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Stunning piece !!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for to give my porch that little "something special !" It's is absolutely gorgeous , mesmerizing & such a unique piece !! I get so many compliments from our guests . I plan on purchasing more for the home !
customer_reviews.author: Amiee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work any more. It will not activate, so sad. The return window was so short, we lost out with this product. It worked and then it did not.
customer_reviews.author: Nadene Turney

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a birthday present and she really likes it. So many times I have purchased an item like this is they work for a period of time then stop working. We have only had this one for about 3 or 4 days and so far so good. Looks good at night. I am happy and so is my wife,
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: weather resistance is not good.  Last less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After < three months, the external decorative coating started to Peel off.. The, weather resistance is not as promised
customer_reviews.author: Shuan Pei Cheong

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This looks really cool when it's lit up at night. It's nice and bright after a sunny day and I love the changing colors. My only complaint is that the bottom is open. That just doesn't seem like the best design idea to me, but so far it hasn't affected it in any way of staying put on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: While the light lasts a long time, the battery/solar life is wonderful, the tiles not so much. They started to fall off the first year. That being said, would I order it again...probably. Because it is so pretty when lite up and it does last so long. The joy I have had looking at it is much greater than the anger of finding a tile once again in the deck.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: LOOK at the dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Update: I am upgrading my stars because customer service immediately reached out to me and made it right. Great customer service! Some people enjoy the globe and it is pretty, just small. Happy days! Original review: This thing is comically small. Don't be like me. Read the dimensions before buying. For $15 I should've gotten four of these, not one tiny cheaply made flat topped globe. Also the solar panel just sits loosely in the top and easily falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice crackle effect on this light.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this globe very much but the colors are not quite as intense as they look in the picture. I'm sure they vary. I have this placed in an area that does not get full sun much but I still get about 6 to 8 hours of light from it each evening if it has not been a cloudy day.
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon Driver

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great touch for our front porch! We've had rain, snow, ice and it's still working well even without being in full sun all day (it's on the NW corner of the house). It is open on the bottom so it won't fill with water which is great compared to some other lights we've had. It would definitely make a nice gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this new solar light
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this new solar light! I have it on my back patio and I love just staring at it at night changing colors. You do have the option of keeping the light white which still looks very pretty with the colorful cracked glass. I have mine up the covered part of my patio to help protect it from the intense heat and rain so it will last longer. I'm going to order one for my friends birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty ,shiny,  solar globe.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I had it. The wind blew , it rolled over and cracked in pieces. :(, couldn't be fixed. It was really bright and the colors were so pretty. I would bring it in at night so it doesnt get destroyed. I had mine on my picnic table , it looked nice and it's a good size not small at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Espersen

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute but it does not light up as brightly as the picture. Update... customer service is excellent. They replaced the product. It us slightly brighter. Still very pretty but I wouldn't buy it again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Check it out
customer_reviews.text: would have liked it to be a little larger but it lights up very pretty at night which is what I wanted only had a short time , with that in mind...have enjoyed that it does continue working well into the late night last longer than me I have mine outdoors set up under a large tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mea

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the solar color changing light. The coloring of the glass is beautiful and the lighting is nice. It is smaller than I expected but serves my purpose well. It looked so nice on my table that I ordered a second one for another table. The effect is great.
customer_reviews.author: R B C’s G.G.

customer_reviews.title: My Best Solar Light!
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought, but big enough. The color change mode is outstanding! It is beautiful and charges even on cloudy days It does not have a bottom and it is lightweight. These are not a problem for me. It is brighter and lasts longer than any solar light I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! I have several styles and this is by far my favorite! I only wish I could order more than one at a time. I've ordered a few! It's beautiful both day and night!
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: It looks super cute
customer_reviews.text: I like that the glass is thick enough. It has options for a single colour light or a multicoloured light. The size is also quite good. Just had an power outage to to the storm and this light came handy. The mosaic give a multidimensional light which looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarfaraz Khan

customer_reviews.title: Met our expected outcome
customer_reviews.text: The lights are smaller than I had imagined, but I'm OK with that. The light is subtle and does not glare in your eyes while you are sitting on the patio. We installed four strands overhead on the patio cover in rows of two. There is enough light in which to enjoy your company with some candlelight without the light being too harsh. The lights are also over our French doors, and they do not disturb us in the house. I find them to enhance the outdoors, rather than make the light the focal point like our path lighting lights do.
customer_reviews.author: Earringirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks are deceiving!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was not happy when I unpacked this item. Silly me, I expected it to look blue. Then I realized "ahhhh, wait till night time and its lit up"! I did...and it looks awesome lit up at night. Just the perfect amount of light! My daughter wants to steal it for her bedroom! Lol! So, I many be ordering another one! 😊
customer_reviews.author: MFitz

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still cool
customer_reviews.text: I just received today. It’s cool looking. It’s a mosaic ball of glass pieces and grout over a glass that is open on top and bottom, with a solar light. I guess I was expecting it to be a bit larger, it fits in my large hand. It will make my backyard table pretty at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kat L

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting beauty
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these at the top of my water feature. They have held up well and hold the charge through the night, even in our western Washington winter. Beautiful in the snow. I just replaced the AA battery in one and it is back to functioning.
customer_reviews.author: everjoyful

customer_reviews.title: VERY PRETTY; WORKED IMMEDIATELY
customer_reviews.text: This is really very pretty. It arrived yesterday evening, and it worked as soon as I turned it on, which surprised me. The colors aren't quite as bright as depicted, but they are bright enough to be beautiful. I plan to buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M. Okey

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely pretty at night but I was expecting it to put out much more colorful light. I have on an out door patio table and the walls are only 6 feet away. I was hoping to see color on the walls. It’s beautiful just don’t expect much light off of it
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Lu

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was looking for a garden-stake solar when I ran across this gem with unbelievably positive reviews. I watched the videos and decided it was certainly worth the price if was even half as pretty as the videos. Wow! Definitely lives up to the reviews! Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Lane Cook

customer_reviews.title: These solar balls are beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these balls after reading other customer reviews and plan to buy more. The colors are bright and stunning. I have put them outside during the day and bring them in at dusk and use them as both night lights over night and as a relaxing, cheerful light on a counter or tabletop in the evening. Even on a cloudy day the colors stay bright until the next morning. I have put the balls on my deck during a heavy rain but the packaging does indicate they are waterproof. Even being on a covered deck all day with no sunshine the balls remained lit all night. I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for the price. I was concerned there's no bottom to the globe, and it's smaller than I would have liked, but it works great and has endured rain and wind. I have it in a hanging metal basket close to the deck entrance. I had hoped I could place it in the yard, but you really need to experience the globe closer--the item loses its effect further away. The colors are very nice, and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Fabulous FinnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Update. The warranty plan on these do not work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 5 of these. One doesn’t work on the color setting. I did take warranty out so will be returning it. I don’t recommend the warranty plan. Bought 5 lights and 5 plans. I contacted them and still haven’t heard from them. I won’t be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a friends outdoor living area. It works great. The settings are multicolored or white. It puts off enough light and adds color to the table. The solar panel charges the light fully even in low sun conditions. The only drawback is that the solar panel piece (the top) doesn’t screw on, it just sits on top. It doesn’t feel very secure but it hasn’t created any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Color Changing Solar Powered Glass Ball LED by Pandawill.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this Pandawill Mosaic Glass Solar Powered. It arranged very well packaged. Nothing cracked or broken. I love it, I ordered this as a gift for my mom and she absolutely loved. I will order some for myself, sister and friends. It would make a great Christmas gift, as well. I highly recommend this to anyone that has a garden, patio or balcony that they want to show off with this beautiful piece of a mosaic look.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Love them, bright morphing relaxing lights
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one last year and ordered another this year! The morphing colors, they are vibrant and relaxing. Put one on each side of my covered deck rail and have even brought them inside when it gets too cold. Love them and wouldn't hesitate to buy another. Arrived on time and were packaged very well!
customer_reviews.author: Spokane WA

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE DOES NOT WORK/NO LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying 2 of these - neither one works after being in the sun 3 days - I see there are many 1 stars even though it does not really reflect the graph shown when purchasing. Absolute JUNK - DON'T BUY IT! Returning /boxing/ mailing /shipping UGH - this should be taken off Amazon as a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: pretty but fragile
customer_reviews.text: I do like it and it is pretty but its too fragile to keep outside. It is a glass ball and has no stand to keep it sturdy. If I put it inside it will not glow and if I keep it outside I have to make sure it is not windy or any one around that can knock it over.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Langford

customer_reviews.title: Best solar light ever
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest solar lights ever. It is very bright and stays lit for hours after the sun goes down. I just bought a third and fourth one. will probably buy more too. The light is delivered promptly and the seller is great. Just did buy another one because a squirrel broke mine. So pretty at night!
customer_reviews.author: C. Petruzelli

product_meta.title: Pandawill Color Changing Mosaic Solar Light, Multi-colored1 Waterproof/Weatherproof Crystal Glass Globe Ball Light for for Garden, Patio, Party, Yard, Outdoor/Indoor Decorations
feature_bullets: 5. 24*5. 24*3. 90 inches Solar Powered Glass Ball LED Lights: covered with colorful mosaic glasses, creates a romantic and lovely atmosphere.
Two Lighting Modes: single mode (soft white light) and color-changing mode (fantastic colorful light), This cute and beautiful solar table lamp can meet your different using demands.
Highly Efficient Solar Panel: this solar garden light supported with powerful solar panel and built-in rechargeable Ni-MH battery, lights up for 8 hours after getting fully charged.
Panda will newest product, sensitive to light, auto on at night and auto off at the sunrise; Convenient to use, no further wire or installation required.
Why You Need It: energy-saving and waterproof design make it ideal decorative lamp for indoor/outdoor, as well as gift-giving.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,443 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
